# Generated by Mahiro Lab installer

# Codex worker outputs and research
.mahirolab/workers/
.mahirolab/research/

# Codex state files (optional - uncomment to ignore)
# .mahirolab/state/context.md
# .mahirolab/state/execution_log.md
# .mahirolab/state/progress.md

# Codex state history (recommended to keep in git)
# .mahirolab/state/context_history/
# .mahirolab/state/plans/
# .mahirolab/state/retrospectives/

# Archived state files
.mahirolab/state/archive/

# Level 1 output directory
codex_output/

# Temporary files
*.tmp
*.temp
.mahirolab/**/*.tmp
.mahirolab/**/*.temp

# macOS
.DS_Store

# Backup files
*.bak
*~
